task.name: tasks.CreateThenFilter
task.description:
For an agent to move toward an planned checkpoint, create it and use it in order to filtrate crowds that interact with it.
The object won't be created and build if agent doesn't have the physical capability or if it hasn't enough resources to do it

parameter.name: plannedWork
parameter.description: The plannified work to create and use to filter.

parameter.name: intensity
parameter.description: The strenght that is used to filter crowds. The value is defined between 0 and 100. A value of '0' means "no filtration at all". A value of '100' means "totally blocked" (the crowds that interact with the checkpoint cannot go through it).

parameter.name: removeWork
parameter.description: Define if planned work that is beeing used to filter crowds need to be destroyed at the end of the task.
